definitions.definition: Causing offense ; arousing a visceral reaction of disgust, anger, hatred, sadness, or indignation.
Relating to an offense or attack , as opposed to defensive .
examples: The army's offensive capabilities. An offensive weapon.

definitions.definition: Having to do with play directed at scoring.
examples: The offensive coordinator is responsible for ordering all rushing plays.

main_definition: Causing offense ; arousing a visceral reaction of disgust, anger, hatred, sadness, or indignation.
secondary_definitions: Relating to an offense or attack , as opposed to defensive .
( sports ) Having to do with play directed at scoring.
